entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
